titles.title: Impeachment Trial Managers resolution
Appointing the authorizing managers for the impeachment trial of William Jefferson Clinton, President of the United States.

action.text: DEBATE - The Chair ruled that the resolution under consideration constituted a question of the privileges of the House and the House proceeded with one hour of debate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 198 (Roll no. 6).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Appoints specified Members of the House of Representatives as managers to conduct the impeachment trial against William Jefferson Clinton, the President of the United States. Authorizes such managers to exhibit the articles of impeachment to the Senate and to take other necessary actions related to the articles of impeachment.
